# The `AliasScopeNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a simple wrapper around an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> which provides a higher-level interface by hiding the details of how alias analysis information is encoded in its operands. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::AliasScopeNode</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This is a simple wrapper around an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> which provides a higher-level interface by hiding the details of how alias analysis information is encoded in its operands.

Definition at line 1573 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
